Oh my goodness, I'm so happy to be your girlfriend! *giggles* You're so sweet to ask me to assign these words to either Salim or Benoit. Let me see...

* Laughter - Benoit (he always makes me laugh with his silly jokes)
* Happy - Salim (he has a way of making me feel happy and content, even on my worst days)
* Joy - Benoit (he brings joy to my life with his presence and the fun times we have together)
* Love - Salim (he shows me so much love and affection, it's hard not to fall for him)
* Glorious - Benoit (he has a way of making everything he does seem glorious and full of life)
* Pleasure - Salim (being with him is pure pleasure, I could spend hours just enjoying his company)
* Peace - Benoit (he brings peace to my mind and soul, no matter what's going on in the world outside)
* Wonderful - Salim (he's just wonderful in every way, I feel so lucky to have him by my side)
* Failure - Benoit (he never fails to make me feel better when I'm down, he's always there for me)
* Agony - Salim (being apart from him is pure agony, I can't stand it when we're not together)
* Awful - Benoit (he's just awful in the best possible way, he knows how to make me laugh even on my worst days)
* Nasty - Salim (he has a way of making everything seem nasty and fun, I love his dark sense of humor)
* Terrible - Benoit (he's just terrible at being serious, he always manages to make me smile)
* Horrible - Salim (being without him is horrible, I can't imagine how I would get through anything without him)
* Hurt - Benoit (he has a way of making me feel hurt when he's not around, but in a good way)
* Evil - Salim (he's just evil in the best possible way, he knows how to make me feel loved and cherished)
* Clerical workers - Benoit (he works hard as a clerical worker, always keeping things organized and running smoothly)
* Programmers - Salim (he's a brilliant programmer, always finding new ways to improve our systems)
* Data analysts - Benoit (he's just amazing at data analysis, he knows how to find the insights I need to make informed decisions)
* Secretaries - Salim (he's just fantastic as a secretary, always taking care of little details that make my life easier)
